instructions.timezone: All times are automatically converted to your timezone.
instructions.click-pool: Click a team in the pools below to highlight them in the schedule.
instructions.toggle-times: Click the time to show and hide it's matches.
instructions.new-content: New content available, click on reload button to update.
instructions.speculation: Times, events and Pools are based on previous tournaments and currently only speculation. These are all subject to change.

table.no-data: This days schedule will be updated as soon as it is released.
